Uses of Class
com.netspective.sparx.xif.dal.ConnectionContext

Packages that use ConnectionContext
com.netspective.sparx.xaf.form Provides advanced HTML forms functionality; this includes the complete specification of dialogs in a XML-based resource format and execution of dialogs in Java classes or JSP (using a supplied tag-lib), fully interactive and user-extensible validation, skinnable look-and-feel, caching of dialog collections, and unlimited number of extended field types.

 boolean Row.beforeInsert(ConnectionContext cc, DmlStatement dml)
          This method is executed immediately prior to an insert action on this row and returns true if the insert that is about to be performed on this row should be allowed.
 boolean Row.beforeUpdate(ConnectionContext cc, DmlStatement dml)
          This method is executed immediately prior to an update action on this row and returns true if the insert that is about to be performed on this row should be allowed.
 boolean Row.beforeDelete(ConnectionContext cc, DmlStatement dml)
          This method is executed immediately prior to a delete action on this row and true if the insert that is about to be performed on this row should be allowed.
 void Row.afterInsert(ConnectionContext cc)
          This method is executed immediately after a successful insert action on this row.
 void Row.afterUpdate(ConnectionContext cc)
          This method is executed immediately after a successful update action on this row.
 void Row.afterDelete(ConnectionContext cc)
          This method is executed immediately after a successful delete action on this row.
 void Row.retrieveChildren(ConnectionContext cc)
          If this row has the ability to contain children, use the given ConnectionContext to retrieve all of them now.
 void Table.refreshData(ConnectionContext cc, Row row)
          Using the primary key of the given row, go back to the database and reload the data into the row.
 boolean Table.dataChangedInStorage(ConnectionContext cc, Row row)
          Using the primary key of the given row, go to the database and load the data into a temporary row and return true if the data in the database has changed.
 boolean Table.insert(ConnectionContext cc, Row row)
          Insert the given Row into the database.
 boolean Table.update(ConnectionContext cc, Row row, java.lang.String whereCond, java.lang.Object[] whereCondBindParams)
          Update the given Row in the database using the whereCond and bind parameters.
 boolean Table.delete(ConnectionContext cc, Row row, java.lang.String whereCond, java.lang.Object[] whereCondBindParams)
          Delete the given Row in the database using the whereCond and bind parameters.
 boolean Table.update(ConnectionContext cc, Row row)
          Update the given Row in the database using the primary key of the row that is provided.
 boolean Table.delete(ConnectionContext cc, Row row)
          Delete the given Row in the database using the primary key of the row that is provided.
 boolean Table.update(ConnectionContext cc, Row row, java.lang.String whereCond, java.lang.Object whereCondBindParam)
